title: Crypto Wallet Guide
description: Learn how to create your first crypto wallet in 5 minutes to use Confidance

subtitle.text: The first key to your financial freedom

description.text: Before using Confidance to manage your crypto payments with full autonomy, you need one thing: your wallet. No sign-up, no form. Just you, your wallet, and the blockchain.
Think of a digital safe that only you can open. Or better: a magic key that gives you access to your funds, wherever you are, 24/7, with no intermediary.

cards.title: Your ownership
cards.description: No one else can touch it

highlight.text: Unlike a bank account where the bank manages everything, here you are the owner. No one can block, limit, or access your funds without your permission.

title.text: Why a wallet is essential for Confidance

subtitle.text: Confidance doesn't work like a traditional bank

summary.title: In short
summary.text: Confidance gives you the tools to manage your automatic payments. But you control the money, through your wallet.

steps.title: Choose a wallet
steps.description: Several options exist (see below). Pick the one you like.

steps.title: Install the app
steps.description: On mobile: download the app from the App Store or Google Play. On desktop: add the extension to your browser (Chrome, Firefox, Brave‚Ä¶).

steps.title: Create a new wallet
steps.description: Follow the on-screen instructions. It's guided and intuitive.

steps.title: Save your secret phrase
steps.description: Your wallet will generate a recovery phrase (12 or 24 words). This phrase is THE key to your safe.

warning.text: Write it on paper, keep it safe, NEVER share it.

subtitle.text: Confidance is compatible with all of these wallets

wallets.name: MetaMask
wallets.description: MetaMask is the most used wallet worldwide. Available as a browser extension and mobile app.

wallets.name: Rainbow
wallets.description: Rainbow focuses on simplicity and aesthetics. Ideal if you prefer managing crypto from your smartphone.

wallets.name: Trust Wallet
wallets.description: Trust Wallet supports thousands of tokens and blockchains. Very comprehensive.

wallets.name: Coinbase Wallet
wallets.description: If you already use Coinbase, their wallet is a natural, simple and reliable extension.

warning.title: Important
warning.text: Always download from the official sites listed above. Beware of links on social media or by email.

subtitle.text: Your wallet is powerful, but security depends on you

rules.title: NEVER share your secret phrase
rules.description: No one should know it. Not Confidance, not support, not a "consultant". Ever.

rules.title: Confidance will never ask for it
rules.description: If someone asks for your phrase claiming to be from Confidance, it's a scam.

rules.title: Lose the phrase = lose access
rules.description: If you lose your recovery phrase, you lose access to your wallet. No one can help. Write it down carefully.

rules.title: Always verify the sites you visit
rules.description: Make sure the URL is correct before interacting with a site (phishing = fake sites are very common).

bonus.title: Bonus tip
bonus.text: Start small: test with small amounts first to get comfortable. Trust is built with experience. Feel free to create multiple wallets for work, personal‚Ä¶ It's completely free.

title.text: Your wallet: first step into DeFi

subtitle.text: Creating a wallet is more than installing an app. It's stepping through the door of a new financial system.

features.title: You pay
features.description: Whoever you want, whenever you want

items.title: Autonomy
items.description: You decide, you sign, you control

items.title: Transparency
items.description: Everything is visible on the blockchain

conclusion.text: Your wallet is the bridge between you and DeFi. Once it's ready, anything is possible.

description.text: You've completed the first step, the one that opens all the others. You're now ready to manage your crypto payments with full freedom.
